scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && parcel build --no-source-maps --no-optimize application/index.html  && cp application/manifest.webapp dist && mkdir dist/assets && cp -r application/assets/icons dist/assets/ &&  mkdir -p dist/assets/js/ && cp application/assets/js/kaiads.v5.min.js dist/assets/js/
scripts.web: rm -rf webpage/* && parcel build --dist-dir webpage --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-optimize application/index.html && cp application/manifest.webapp webpage && cp application/manifest.webmanifest webpage && mkdir -p webpage/assets && cp -r application/assets/icons webpage/assets/ && mkdir -p webpage/assets/js/ && cp application/assets/js/kaiads.v5.min.js webpage/assets/js/ && cp -r application/assets/image webpage/assets/ && cp -r application/assets/fonts webpage/assets/
